analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/18/0xd5dc75c85159e95f0bd8b5196f4f096a6b7fea1f.sol:
	Contract BMICoin has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/18/0xd5dc75c85159e95f0bd8b5196f4f096a6b7fea1f.sol#272-273)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/18/0xd5dc75c85159e95f0bd8b5196f4f096a6b7fea1f.sol:
